name: The Page of Cups
description:
In a world menaced by supervillains, the Page of Cups stands out. Not for being the most dangerous, or the most violent. No, he’s just the most confusing.

You play as Proximo, the superhero tasked with dealing with him. Along the way, you must attempt to foil his schemes, and hopefully discover what his motives really are in the end.

5 endings, each with varying degrees of “good.”

(If you'd rather play in browser, you should be able to play it at the following link: http://127.0.0.1:8042/index.html)
